src:
Grci odustali, rastu šanse Srbije
06 Nov 2019, 10:56 by Darko
Košarkaški savez Grčke je odustao od kandidature za organizaciju kvalifikacionog turnira za plasman na Olimpijske igre u Tokiju.
Savez je dostavio aplikaciju za domaćinstvo, ali Vlada Grčke nije depozit kako bi kandidatura bila validna, potvrdio je predsednik KS Grčke Jorgos Vasilakopulos.
– Sve smo uradili oko kandidature osim finansijskih uslova. Pre tri meseca smo kontaktirali Vladu, ali nismo dobili odgovor. Oni se prave gluvi. Čekali smo mesec i po dana bez odgovora, rekao je Vasilakopulos.
Kandidature su za sada potvrdili Srbija i Hrvatska, a očekuje se da uskoro isto učini i Litvanija. Prema najavama, FIBA će dva od četiri kvalifikaciona turnira za Tokio, dodeliti evropskim federacijama.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Greeks give up, Serbia's chances increase
06 Nov 2019, 09:56 by Darko
The Greek Basketball Federation has withdrawn its bid to host a qualifying tournament for the Tokyo Olympics.
The Alliance has submitted a household application, but the Greek government is not a deposit for the candidacy to be valid, confirmed Greek Greek President George Vasilakopoulos.
- We did everything about the candidacy except the financial conditions. Three months ago, we contacted the Government but received no response. They make themselves deaf. We waited a month and a half without answering, Vasilakopoulos said.
Nominations have been confirmed by Serbia and Croatia for the time being, and Lithuania is expected to do the same soon. According to the announcement, FIBA will award two of the four qualifying tournaments for Tokyo, to European Federations.
